name: split_records
short_description:
This tool requires gnu gcc and make utilities.

It works with supplying a delimiter and the number of columns in the exported table. The alternative to this tool is splitting with the unix split [-option] utility that may split in the middle of a record. 

This tool ensures that the middle of record split do not happen. And in the event it does so, if the wrong delimiter and/or an incorrect number of columns is entered, the offending record is printed to stdout, and a warning of the possibility of incorrect inputs.
summary: Split into multiple files, database file with clob datatype
